昫字的基本解释

昫
xù
同“煦”。

昫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《廣韻》香句切，去遇，曉。］
温暖；日出温。参见“昫伏”。
[②]［xiǒng］
［《集韻》詡拱切，上腫，曉。］
军中旦明五鼓为“發昫”。

昫字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　昫； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页493第19
【唐韻】火于切【集韻】【韻會】匈于切，?音訏。【說文】日出溫也。【玉篇】暖也。同煦。【淮南子·原道訓】昫嫗覆育。【註】昫，溫恤也。　又縣名。【後漢·光武紀】進圍董憲、龐萌於昫。【註】昫，縣名，屬東海郡。　又【廣韻】香句切【集韻】【韻會】吁句切，?音煦。又【集韻】【韻會】?火羽切，音詡。義?同。　又【集韻】詡拱切，音洶。【司馬法】鼓，旦明五通爲發昫。

昫字的源字形

昫字的起名意思

同“煦”。形容温暖，做名词时也表示太阳光。

Xu
Basic explanation of words
Xu
xù
Same as "Xue".
Xu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xù］
["Guangyun" fragrant sentences cut, go to meet, Xiao. ]
Warm; sunrise temperature. See "Sufu".
[②]［xiǒng］
["Jiyun" cut through the arch, swollen on the top, and dawn. ]
The five drums of Danming in the army are "Fachu".
Xu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　昫; Kangxi strokes: 9; page number: page 493 19
[Tang Yun] Huo Yuqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] Hungarian Yuqie,? Yinxu. [Said the text] The sunrise is also warm. [Jade articles] Warm also. Same as Xu. 【Huainanzi·Yuan Daoxun】The re-education of the concubine. [Note] Zhu, also warm shirt.　Also the county name. [Later Han·Guangwu Ji] Entered into Dong Xian and Pang Meng Yu Zhu. [Note] Zhu, the name of the county, belongs to Donghai County.　[Guangyun] Fragrant Sentence Cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] Sentence cut,? Yinxu. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Fire feather cut, sound 诩. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] again, arched and cut, the sound is fierce. [Sima Method] Drum, Danming and five links are for hair.
